mrdrivers 0.3.0
  • Reference

calcUrbanPop

Source: R/calcUrbanPop.R
calcUrbanPop.Rd

calcUrbanPop

calcUrbanPop(
  UrbanCalib = "past",
  UrbanPast = "WDI",
  UrbanFuture = c("SSPs", "SDPs", "SSP2EU"),
  extension2150 = "constant",
  FiveYearSteps = TRUE,
  naming = "indicator_scenario"
)

Arguments

UrbanCalib

To what should be calibrated? past or future?
UrbanPast

Urban past data source
UrbanFuture

Urban future data source
extension2150

string, either "bezier", "constant" or "none"
FiveYearSteps

FiveYearSteps = TRUE is no longer supported; use the calcOutput argument years instead, to retrieve specific years.
naming

naming scheme

Value

A magpie object with sets "iso3c", "year" and "variable".

See also

madrat::calcOutput()

Other Urban functions: calcUrbanFuture(), calcUrbanPast(), calcUrban()

Other Combined scenario functions: calcGDPpc(), calcGDP(), calcPopulation(), calcUrban()

Examples

if (FALSE) {
library(mrdrivers)
calcOutput("UrbanPop")
}
